extensionDescription.message: Track your learning growth with a cute cat companion every day!

createCheckInPlan.message: Create a check-in plan for this site?

setGoalTip.message: Set a goal, let the cat accompany your learning

continuousCheckInTip.message: Continuous check-ins help the cat grow

firstTimeMessage.message: Welcome to {site}! Start your learning journey!

continueMessage.message: Continue learning at {site} and maintain your streak!

checkInSuccess.message: Successfully checked in for {site}! Total streak: {days} days

apiKeyDescription.message: With an OpenAI API key, MewTrack can intelligently identify whether web content is educational.

deepseekApiDescription.message: DeepSeek is an alternative to OpenAI that can also intelligently identify learning content.

customSiteDescription.message: Add other websites you want to track. Check-in popup will appear on each visit.
